name: The Trials of Ildrarth
description:
This game was made for WGJ 80 on the theme 'Winning is losing', which I suggested. While in a normal platformer gold and coins would make you win, in this one they are your enemies.

Story:  

As a cleric in the temple of the god Ildrarth, you've been training your whole life for this.

The Trials. 

You'll find yourself in a land full of treasures but you must not touch any of them.
Without touching any gold, you'll have to get to the Sacred Fire to become one of Ildrarth's true warriors

By the way thanks to Kevin Montes - kraed.montes@gmail.com, who saved me from getting out of the music category since my original musician kinda forgot about me. Kevin made the main theme of the game.

Any feedback you might have please leave a comment :)
